select bm.board_code, bm.board_title, bm.board_content, bm.board_writer, um.username as board_username, bm.board_count, (select count(*) from board_mst) as board_count_all, bm.create_date, bm.update_date from board_mst bm left outer join user_mst um on(um.usercode = bm.board_writer) order by board_code desc limit #{index}, 5;
